verses.name: Isaiah 66:12
verses.text: For thus saith the Lord, Behold, I will extend peace to her like a river, and the glory of the Gentiles like a flowing stream: then shall ye suck, ye shall be borne upon her sides, and be dandled upon her knees.

verses.name: Isaiah 66:13
verses.text: As one whom his mother comforteth, so will I comfort you; and ye shall be comforted in Jerusalem.

verses.name: Isaiah 66:14
verses.text: And when ye see this, your heart shall rejoice, and your bones shall flourish like an herb: and the hand of the Lord shall be known toward his servants, and his indignation toward his enemies.
